backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Nebacrypt backend, defining project submission management, user profiles, access control, blob storage, and email notification logic with Norwegian-language error messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the MusicPage tracklist was updated to display all 11 Synthetic Agondonters tracks in the specified order, with high confidence tied to a single frontend file change.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, used for build planning and documentation purposes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Nebacrypt React app with Norwegian language attribute, SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter Card metadata, and a vector favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page routing across seven page types, authentication state, profile setup modal display, and scroll behavior, wrapped in ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying the Nebacrypt logo, copyright and caffeine.ai attribution, a centered nencrypt.com link, and contact details with org number and Oslo address.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation header with desktop and mobile menus, Internet Identity login/logout, admin dashboard link for admins, and an 'Internet Computer' nav item.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading overlay showing the Nebacrypt logo with a pulse animation, a spinning ring, and the Norwegian text 'Laster inn...'.
frontend/src/components/MusicTrackCard.t: A card component that renders a clickable link to a Suno music track, with a helper function that parses a human-readable title from the Suno URL.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects name, email, and optional company from a new user and creates their profile via the useCreateUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/PublicSubmission: A public-facing project submission form that collects client details and budget, submits the project via useSubmitProject, and shows a success state after submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, including user profile CRUD, project submission, and message queries, with cache invalidation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining light and dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens, plus base and utility layer overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays all project submissions in a table, allows status management (reviewed, followup, in-progress, completed), messaging, and delivery link management. Uses multiple React Query hooks and renders dialogs for detailed submission views.
frontend/src/pages/ClientPortal.tsx: Client-facing portal page where authenticated users (via Internet Identity) can submit projects, view their existing project statuses, and exchange messages with admins. Includes login/logout handling and status badge rendering.
frontend/src/pages/ICPInfoPage.tsx: Informational page (in Norwegian) explaining Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) technology, covering key pillars like canisters, subnets, chain-key cryptography, NNS governance, and use cases such as DeFi, NFTs, and dApps.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page with a hero section, ICP teaser, services overview, and contact info, supporting smooth scroll-to-section navigation and links to the client portal and music page.
frontend/src/pages/MusicPage.tsx: Music showcase page listing tracks by 'Synthetic Agondonters' with links to Suno, a hero image, and a description of the collective, along with a link to the Suno profile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, using sessionStorage for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via OKLCH variables, fonts, border radii, shadows, animations) and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for the Synthetic Agondonters music website, recording the fixed 11-track custom order for the music page and tracking existing features and architectural notes.
